results.definition: stay the same; remain in a certain state
examples: The dress remained wet after repeated attempts to dry it
He remained unmoved by her tears

results.definition: continue in a place, position, or situation
examples: despite student protests, he remained Dean for another year
The hostility remained long after they made up

results.definition: be left; of persons, questions, problems, results, evidence, etc.
examples: There remains the question of who pulled the trigger
Carter remains the only President in recent history under whose Presidency the U.S. did not fight a war
